name: Purrfect Apawcalypse: Ideal Finale!!!
storyline:
A few days after the tragedy at Hanako-Land... Kemono-High and Hachiko-High are back to their normal hustle and bustle. However, there is still something left to be done...

When a softly puppy and a delinquent shepherd meet, all the mysteries are revealed and Kemono-Town's greatest crisis arrives!

Will it be the dog, the cat, ...or the demon that has the last laugh?
summary: This is the PA series fourth Fan-game!
